text: Children of Nature () is a 1991 Icelandic Norwegian German romantic drama movie directed by Friðrik Þór Friðriksson and starring Gísli Halldórsson, Sigríður Hagalín, Baldvin Halldórsson, Björn Karlsson, Bruno Ganz. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1992. == Other websites == * Category:1991 romantic drama movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Norwegian romance movies Category:Norwegian drama movies Category:German romance movies Category:German drama movies Category:Movies directed by Friðrik Þór Friðriksson
title: Children of Nature
